title: client takes 2+ minutes to launch the game
body:
client will display the "game in progress" screen for 2-3 minutes before i see the league of legends icon signaling the loading screen will pop up soon.
gpu on 70% which is normal and cpu is on <20%. my internet is normal with minimal jitter. idk why its doing this and it just started pretty recently as a slight delay but has gotten worse every day until im at where i am now, where everyone loads in before me and remakes before i can even join

replies.body: If the game itself is taking awhile to show up, something like that is going to be mostly hardware related since your pc is struggling to begin loading the game. Let's try a quick repair through the client options first and test it in a custom/practice game. If that doesn't seem to help at all, go ahead and grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall**.
thank you the quick repair worked
